content: Company Leave Policy Overview: Full-time employees receive annual, sick, and casual leave. Leave year is Jan 1–Dec 31. Unused annual leave carryover is 6 days.
Annual Leave Policy: Employees get 18 paid annual leave days per year. Accrues monthly at 1.5 days. Max 6 carry-forward. Cannot combine with sick leave.
Sick Leave Policy: 12 sick leave days per year. Medical certificate required for more than 2 consecutive days. Sick leave cannot be encashed.
Casual Leave Policy: 8 days per year. Intended for unplanned needs. Cannot be combined with annual leave.
Holiday Policy: Company provides 10 fixed public holidays and 2 floating holidays. Holiday list published every December.
Benefits Overview: Medical insurance for employee and dependents. Life insurance coverage is 2x annual salary. Meal card ₹2,000 per month. Travel allowance ₹1,500.
Expense Reimbursement: Only business expenses reimbursed. Claims must be submitted within 30 days. Bills above ₹500 require manager approval.
Work From Home Policy: Employees may work from home up to 8 days per month. Manager approval required. Must attend meetings and stay available.
Code of Conduct: Professional behavior required. Harassment or discrimination prohibited. Confidential information must not be shared.
Performance Review: Performance reviewed twice a year. Ratings range from 1 to 5. Evaluation based on goals and teamwork.
Onboarding Overview: First 30 days include paperwork, IT setup, HR induction, and team introduction.
Day 1 Checklist: Submit ID proofs, bank details, collect laptop, set up email, attend HR orientation.
IT Setup Guide: Login with temporary password, set MFA, install VPN, install tools like VSCode, Jira, and Confluence.
Required Documents: Aadhaar or Passport, PAN, relieving letter from previous employer, bank cheque.
Training Modules: Compliance training, cybersecurity awareness, and job-specific training in LMS.
Payroll Setup: Salary processed on 30th monthly. Bank details must be updated in HR portal.
Team Introduction: Manager schedules intro meeting, explains product, assigns a buddy.
Probation Policy: Probation period lasts 3 months. Confirmation depends on performance.
Access Management: Jira, GitHub, and internal tools access granted based on role. Requests through IT desk.
Laptop Usage Policy: Work laptop must be used for professional tasks only. Unauthorized apps not allowed.
